2022-02-01T16-02-22Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2023-11-06T21-21-26Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2022-02-01T16-02-22Z.workflow:
name: Semgrep
on:
  pull_request: {}
jobs:
  semgrep:
    name: Scan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: (github.actor != 'dependabot[bot]' && github.actor != 'snyk-bot')
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: returntocorp/semgrep-action@v1
        with:
          publishToken: ${{ secrets.SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN }}

2023-11-06T21-21-26Z.workflow:
name: Semgrep
on:
  pull_request: {}
jobs:
  semgrep:
    name: Scan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    container:
      image: returntocorp/semgrep
    if: (github.actor != 'dependabot[bot]' && github.actor != 'snyk-bot')
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - run: semgrep ci
        env:
          SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN }}
